import axios from 'axios' import React, { useState } from 'react' function Form({setRefresh, heading}) { const [data, setData] = useState() function onSubmit (e) { e.preventDefault() axios.post('http://localhost:8000/add-user',data).then((response) => { setRefresh() alert('user added') }) } function onChange (e) { setData({ ...data, [e.target.name]:e.target.value }) } return (
